scripts.test:handler: npm run build && ts-node -e "import('./dist/lambda-handler').then(h => console.log('Handler loaded successfully'))"
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && serverless deploy --stage dev
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && serverless deploy --stage prod
scripts.invoke:local: npm run build && serverless invoke local -f scrapeAmazonSponsoredProducts
